committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds to compensate any individual who, in association with the Nazi government of Germany or a government allied therewith, participated in the persecution of any person because of race, religion, national origin, or political opinion.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal funds from being used to employ or compensate any individual who in association with the Nazi government of Germany (or an ally government) ordered, assisted, or otherwise participated in the persecution of any person because of race, religion, national origin, or political opinion.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds to compensate any individual who, in association with the Nazi government of Germany or a government allied therewith, participated in the persecution of any person because of race, religion, national origin, or political opinion.
